channel.title: IBM
channel.description: International Business Machines Corporation, or IBM, is an American multinational technology and consulting corporation, with headquarters in Armonk, New York, United States. IB...

item.title: BlackBerry Stock Tanks Following Apple's Partnership With IBM
item.dc:creator: Seth Fiegerman
item.description: Apple's big partnership with IBM is proving to be bad news for at least one major tech company: BlackBerry. BlackBerry's stock dipped by nearly 10% in midday trading Wednesday following the announcement late Tuesday that Apple is partnering with IBM to offer special iPads and iPhones to enterprise customers.
